resources.string: Each player chooses heads or tails. A coin will flip revealing either a purple side or a gold side, representing heads or tails respectively. If the player is correct they get one point.

On a 3x3 grid each player takes turns placing their symbol in order to try and get three in a row. Whoever gets three in a row first wins and gets a point. If the board fills and no one gets 3 in a row, the result is a draw. Player 1 is X, Player 2 is O.
Each player chooses rock, paper, or scissors. Rock beats scissors, paper beats rock, scissors beats paper. The winner gets a point.
Each player spins the roulette wheel. The pointer will land at a number on the wheel at the end of the spin. Whoever gets the highest number wins.
Each player player has a button. After randomized timer, the first to tap their button will win. Tapping before the timer will result in a loss.
Each player starts tapping the button as fast as they can. whoever gets the most taps in 5 seconds wins. Game beings win you start tapping
